title: Cryptocurrency TerraUSD Plunges as Investors Bail
sub_head: The algorithmic stablecoin nosedived, briefly pushing it to less than a quarter of its original $1 value
body:
A selloff in a cryptocurrency that was supposed to be pegged to $1 accelerated Wednesday, briefly sending its price to less than a quarter of that value.
TerraUSD traded as low as 23 cents on Wednesday, according to data from CoinDesk. As of 5:15 a.m. ET, it had rebounded partially to about 41 cents in volatile trading.
